lead_paragraph: A spry 96 and grinning ear to ear, Yosh Uchida weaves his right arm around the triceps of three-time hammer throw Olympian Ed Burke and begins to turn him for a good-natured takedown. Burke squeaks "help," Uchida releases him and both men chuckle.

headline.print_headline: Bay Area Judo Coach Yosh Uchida Is Rio-Bound at Age 96
headline.main: Bay Area Judo Coach Yosh Uchida Is Rio-Bound at Age 96

snippet: A spry 96 and grinning ear to ear, Yosh Uchida weaves his right arm around the triceps of three-time hammer throw Olympian Ed Burke and begins to turn him for a good-natured takedown. Burke squeaks "help," Uchida releases him and both men chuckle....
